Windlord::

"If I remember rightly, exists three of two bases around 
Mediterraneand Sea" said Windlord "At whom belong those bases, I 
don't sure..."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> Pyrotaur
> 
>    "He used to be called Cosmotaur.  His element was and still is 
the void.  He's heavily armed.  He carries two rocket launchers, two 
large blasters that can be converted into machine guns, and two 
energy blades.  He was headed toward the Western Mediteranean Sea.  
Do you know of any bases there that would take in someone bent on 
killing people?"
